com.poesys.accounting.db.transaction

Interface ITransaction

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<com.poesys.db.dto.IDbDto>, com.poesys.db.dto.IDbDto, com.poesys.db.dto.IObserver, com.poesys.db.dto.ISubject, java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractTransaction, AbstractTransactionProxy, Transaction, TransactionProxy

    public interface ITransaction
extends com.poesys.db.dto.IDbDto

    A data-access layer data-transfer-object interface for the Transaction. The data-transfer-object class and proxy class implement this interface, as does the business-layer data-transfer-object class.

    An exchange of value between accounts; the items that correspond to the fiscal year accounts must balance (cancel each other out with respect to debits and credits)

    Stereotypes:

    • Persistent
    • SequenceKey

    Class is read/write: true

    Author:
    Poesys/DB Cartridge

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.poesys.db.dto.IDbDto
